website_summaries.verdict: With its 0.8-litre capacity, this is a smaller rice cooker that works well and is easy to clean.
pros: An easy-to-use rice cooker that is well-priced for its size and functionality
Size makes it easy to transport
cons: A few reports of blown fuses

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rice cooker last November (11.2018) and please see attached, that's what I got last night after been using it for only 2 months. The rices were all burnt and the inner pot became very difficult to clean. The cooker's switch was faulty and unable to go back to the WARM mode automatically. I've been using various rice cookers for over 20 years, I've not experienced one with such poor quality like this. To say fairly, this rice cooker is easy to use, and the size is perfect for small families with max. 2-3 people.
customer_reviews.author: Garr Chau

customer_reviews.title: Used once. blew out MCB for kitchen on second use
customer_reviews.text: Used once successfully, very happy with the rice it produced. During its second use I heard a loud bang, went into the kitchen to find every appliance with no power. It turns out that the rice cooker had developed a major short circuit and taken out all power to my kitchen. This also knackered my dinner - burning my house down is okay, stop me from having dinner is a major sin ;) Would I buy again - hell no, something is badly wrong here from the QA side.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: best for single person
customer_reviews.text: a small one, best for single person, or a couple without kids not inviting friends for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: anbu

customer_reviews.title: Favourite kitchen thing
customer_reviews.text: Use it very regularly and it works great for two people. Have used it to feed four with no problem. You can get the rice the way you want it over time by adding more or less water. I also add frozen garlic, oxo cubes and herbs with no problem, just stir when its finished. To clean the pot just soak it in water while your eating and any rice stuck to the bottom will just wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good little rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Good for a single or a couple. Cooks brown rice fine (add 50% more water than for white rice). Not suitable for a family, too small. For brown rice there is no time saving over using a pan - but it is a 'turn it on and forget it' solution: cannot boil dry (cooks the rice then switches off). Super easy to clean compared to a pan. Should have bought one a long time ago. Now I have cooked brown rice portions in the freezer ready to microwave, ready to eat in 1 minute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok sometimes but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Seems temperamental. Works ok sometimes but other times the switch flicks up for no obvious reason before the water is heated and rice is cooked. Pan inside doesn’t sit very snugly inside, which is possible cause. With any rice cooker the benefit is being able to turn it on and leave to cook while you get on with something else. But about half the time this isn’t possible as it needs monitoring and the switch pushing back down to finish off. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: vasquez

customer_reviews.title: LED not working, burnt rice and stinky inside pot
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd rice cooker I own and the 7-8th I have used. I boutht it because I wanted a smaller one. I received a rice cooker with one LED not working (the cooking one). Followed instruction for 2 cups, the rice burned in the bottom and was under-cooked (the latter can be adjusted with more water but it will still burn). After the first use, I noticed an awful synthetic smell on the inner pot.
customer_reviews.author: Rhaoulos

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after using about 20 times
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for about the first 20 times, then suddenly, the COOK button would not stay down. When turned ON it goes to WARM, but the COOK does not stay down.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Blew Up
customer_reviews.text: Blew a fuse on first use and tripped all the switches in the house. Never worked again. Smell of burning. Thankfully the rice in it at the time had only just cooked so dinner wasn't ruined that night but the entire pot went in the bin immediately afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Bentham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use switch on and walk away. Handy convenience gadget
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use don't have to worry about saucepan boiling over and remembering to turn off. Just switch on and walk away. Keep warm function at the end of cycle. Measuring cup is handy 1 cup five 1 cup water no need way of measure. Rice comes out perfect and doesn't even need drainning. Can also put spices in.
customer_reviews.author: Panthergriffin

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few months
customer_reviews.text: I am a convert to rice cookers and thought this would be perfect to cook for two people rather then the normal 10 in our other rice cooker. This worked great the first 8ish times but now is not working which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: elaine1705

customer_reviews.title: Do not understand the question?
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product. The rice sticks to the pan and does not fluff up - either too dry or too stodgy. I have read all the instructions on how to best cook the rice, and despite following them still have the same problem. You get what you pay for is definitely true with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the rice cooker wasn’t expensive, but I was expecting to use it more than a dozen times before it actually stopped working correctly. To start with the non stick pan was clearly of poor quality. Most recently when I was switching it on to cook, it was taking some time to engage. Next time I used it, it simply wouldn’t turn off and burnt the rice. I should have actually took notice to numerous bad reviews and pics.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, not too big, enough for like 4 servings
customer_reviews.text: Used for almost 2 years and it's going well still. Very easy to use. Works for any rice. Follow instructions for rice to water ratio. Perfect size, not too big, enough for like 4 servings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice everytime. The device is so simple to use and the instructions included give you measurements and a few cooking instructions for different types of rice. Absolute essential when doing rice dishes now as I don't have to worry and it can keep the rice warm for a long period of time!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast and lovely rice
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant! I use it to cook meals for 2 people but the rice is cooked perfectly. I never used to cook rice before I had this cooker because it never came out the way i wanted no matter what recipe i would follow. This has helped me a lot. You only need to wash the rice, put it in the cooker put the water in and wait, and you don't have to wait for too long either cause it's really fast. Absolutely recommended! It's a very helpful piece of equipment in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ana-maria dorgo

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever, some rice burnt
customer_reviews.text: I tried this about 3 times before it ended up in the bin. Followed the directions perfectly the first time and the rice was burnt. Second time, we took a suggestion and added more water... it took 45 minutes to cook a single portion of rice. Not worth it, much easier to just fire it into a non-stick pan with boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. E. Mcgookin

customer_reviews.title: Its a good rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Its a good rice cooker, the only downside is that when it starts boiling the water spits out.. i dont know whether its a defect or not..
customer_reviews.author: s.p.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect results and plenty for a small family
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for a small family we only use 3 measures of rice from its own cup and we always have rice left over. It can take 4 measures but we'd be eating rice all week. It's so easy to use and you just leave it alone to do its thing it warms up really quickly and shut off when water is used up but it doesn't switch off it goes to keep warm which is really Handy. Overall it was the perfect but and it must be branded to other suppliers as it's under different names but it's the same but of kit... We love this one though and really well priced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes lovely fluffy rice
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this little rice cooker compact,but can make enough rice for 4 people. Easy to use, takes about 10 mins to cook the rice then switches to keep warm. The rice comes out really fluffy. Did stick to the bottom the first couple off times, I then added a little olive oil after adding the water give it a little stir no more sticking. Good value for money. A perfect 5 all round for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick coating doesn't work - always a layer of rice ...
customer_reviews.text: Non-stick coating doesn't work - always a layer of rice stuck on the bottom. Never had this issue with my previous, similarly priced non-stick rice cooker from Clas Ohlson
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Simply does what can be expected from a Rice Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Simply put the dry rice and water in according to the description and switch it on. Once done it switches from Cooking to Warm. It keeps the rice warm without continuing to cook.
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Bad - keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just bad. It burns the bottom of the rice so that it’s always at least a little crunchy and it sticks so you have to really scrape the bottom to get the rice off. If you put more water in, it still burns and your rice is oversaturated. It’s just rubbish and on multiple occasions I’ve given up and cooked rice in a pan. I’m not just being a snob because this is cheap; I used to have a lovely rice cooker which was a similar price so that must be out there somewhere so don’t buy this one, keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Cooks rice and lentils perfectly together in about 20 to 25 minutes Its easy to clean and doesn't boil over like other rice cookers Very happy with purchase I highly recommended this seller
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to need more water than estimated but it also seems to be too hot as the rice often sticks to bottom of the pot. I can't use it without it making a mess around it. On the plus side, it's great to be able to cook rice without keeping an eye on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍👍👍 for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's currently on right now I made rice with it once and now we're using it for lots of other things. I made popcorn in it and now black garlic. Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Al & Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but it's better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: Well don't really have much to say about this besides it gets the job done, nothing really to big of a deal with, there are loads out there which are better. If you're looking for something simple and not fussed about. This is the right purchase for you...
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good until it's not
customer_reviews.text: Used to work, now there's a 50% chance of my rice cooking properly and a 50% chance it doesnt. Truly a waste of money. Buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice cooker for one or two people
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is exactly what I wanted -- it quickly cooks rice for one-two people. I just stir the rice once or twice before it finishes, otherwise it tends to burn a bit on the bottom (but most of the rice is still fluffy and perfectly cooked).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little Gem
customer_reviews.text: First rice maker I have bought and I’m impressed. So easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Groves

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have a ricecooker
customer_reviews.text: Why have I never had one before?? My Korean friend suggested this one and oh my goodness, going from easy rice or struggling on the stove to this has been mind blowing - Basmati rice out of this cooker is incredible, they aroma and taste makes it so worth it. And really the process is idiot proof, anyone can use it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RobsT

customer_reviews.title: It’s not non stick, a nightmare to clean.
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is NOT non stick. It works okay for a month but even if you use a non abrasive spoon and sponges the rice still sticks to the bottom of the rice cooker pan. It’s a nightmare to clean and half of the times it burns the rice. Don’t waste your money on this. Invest a little more money and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Cooks rice to perfection. It would be a bit small if you have a larger family but it was perfect for us. Cooks quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It makes excellent fluffy rice. Occasionally, produces small amounts of slightly burnt rice in the bottom, but foror the price, it's very good value.
customer_reviews.author: weird nerd

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 11 months ago and have only used it about a dozen times. The warm/cook switch now refuses to change from warm to cook - just goes back to warm. Notice that other one star reviews mention this. Steer clear!
customer_reviews.author: pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous - tripped house electrics on first use
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen is 2yo and complies with current electrical regulation. No previous issues. Previous rice cooker used frequently till the lid broke :( This one, on first use tripped the entire house electric RCD. Unplugging rice cooker, and resetting electrics, worked OK until the rice cooker was plugged in - and the electrics tripped again. Clearly a fault, dangerous design or no QC - either way, not recommended. Retutning
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t cook the rice - the cook button flips up before the rice is cooked - so you are left with Uncooked rice - you Then have to wait for it to cool down and then press the cook again- for the same thing to happen . I have tried using in 3 separate occasions and the same thing happens
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kwakye

customer_reviews.title: Faulty cook switch
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this It stopped working in a few weeks The button for cooking rice is faulty The switch does not work on the cook mode & is faulty I am not able to start the cook mode as the switch does not click on
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Switch button does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The switch button does not work! On first use, the rice cooker did not work. The rice would not cook - the switch button would not stay in cook mode and always pop back to warm mode. At my second attempt, it did work, so I decided not to return it. However, once again, the switch button is not working and the rice is not cooking. The return period has passed, is there any way that I can be reimbursed for this faulty product?
customer_reviews.author: Kirthiha Kumar

customer_reviews.title: quite small, and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This item has a habit of switching off before the rice is cooked, plus it spits boiling water out of the hole in the lid.
customer_reviews.author: MISS A H

customer_reviews.title: Did a brilliant job with cooking Rice and peas
customer_reviews.text: Did a brilliant job with cooking Rice and peas. Bought it for my son who found it very easy to use. And it is small to look at but still can cater for reasonable amount.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Khurram Mirza

customer_reviews.title: Good product but this one failed me.
customer_reviews.text: With regret I must inform you that the Lloytron failed on the third usage. I award 2 stars because I know that it usually is a good product, my last one was in use for 4 years with weekly use until I dropped it, hence this replacement! I shall continue to buy Lloytron Sue Brown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t go down too well. It arrived without a power cable the on button wouldn’t stay down. Ended up with burnt rice. Returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I’ve had this for about three years and never had a problem with it. I live by myself so this is the perfect size for me, but works for 2/3 people as well. It’s compact enough that I can just keep it on my counter and the rice is always perfect. 100% would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Bazzoni

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, but coating is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The cooker does work nicely, but in terms of coating (non-stick), that's rubbish. It's so tedious to clean, the rice sticks quite strongly onto the bowl and only after soaking it in water for 1 day, it's getting easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rice cooker, very practical. The first one had issues and had black smoke when I started using it, but the replacement works fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, easy to use and easy to keep clean, ideal
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 cooks
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy!!! worse rice cooker ever , worked the first 2 times and then keeps saying the rice is cooked when it definitely isn't cause it's half filled with water and it won't allow me to cook again as everytime I try to flick it to cook it automatically flicks back to warm thinking it's cooked
customer_reviews.author: Amin s.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Never been able to "do" rice properly. Bought this, used it once. Perfect rice. Very quick - in fact quicker than I thought it would be and the keep warm function was great, really warm rice 30 mins after cooking. Very very easy to clean. I will be using this a lot I think and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G S Potter-Merrigan

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: What a life saver this is never really thought of getting one it’s easy to use well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Romel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected. It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I thought for this price range would be worse tbh. It works quite well and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 2 months ago. Used it lightly; 2-3 times a week cooking rice for 2 people. It stopped cooking as quickly and instead of 10 minutes to cook the rice it started taking more than 30 minutes. Finally it started smoking and smelling like burnt plastic. Will not use again, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pattle

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but non-stick is cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use but even after washing rice it’s prone to sticking. Soon comes off after soaking but in retrospect paying more for better quality might have been worthwhile
customer_reviews.author: Pete Arden

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Enough for like 2/3 people. Easy and quick to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarauniya

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It cooks faster than I expected, the rice is fluffy and tastes good. Although, there's a little mess when it's boiling; the tendency is that it splashes a little around the rice cooker. But overall, I didn't regret buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Camylle

customer_reviews.title: Good product .
customer_reviews.text: No negative issues all pluses easy to use good fluffy rice took a couple tries to get right portions and fluffy rice, very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Boyinmaroon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little device. Use it everyday since bought. Quick and tasty. No more mess.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Leo

customer_reviews.title: Rice made easy, each and every time 👍
customer_reviews.text: The wife wasn't sure but since buying this she has completely changed her tune. So easy and fuss free.. perfect rice every time and it's small so good for single portions (mostly just myself eating rice at the moment )
customer_reviews.author: ROCONNE1234

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ideal rice cooker for up to 4 people Usually make brown rice and it’s perfect every time
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I get one before
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rice every time - you really can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: @a31burgervan

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not for long term
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, rice tastes great. I won't last long though the rice bowl has already started to burn at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Isla

customer_reviews.title: It is not working.
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. It is 5W. I waited an hour and the water wasn’t even boiling it was just warm. Then I gave up. This doesn’t save time at all. Just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Amélie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great size and good product
customer_reviews.text: Great size and good product. When put too much water to make rice wetter it can be little pain as it will overflow on sights.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: First rice cooker I've purchased - wanted something in the budget price range as I wasn't sure I'd like it. Really pleased with results. Fluffy rice each time I've used it. A steal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: K Cambridge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and wash
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Be aure to wash the rice. I use a finger knuckle length of water above rice. Little less for short grain. Let sit for 10 mins after it says it's ready Perfect everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hau

customer_reviews.title: Cooking rice made easy
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly fine. Cooked rice doesn't stick. Cooks faster than using a casserole on a stove.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality stuff, rice stay warm for at least few hours after when its cooked. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Nazir

customer_reviews.title: Used daily
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our daughter who now eats rice daily. Easier than toast.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use rice maker
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far but was good had one before so I know it is exactly what I need for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great little product . Takes up far less room and holds enough for around 4 ( depending on portion size of course) . Easy to use and clean and nice and compact for small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and doesn’t take up a load of space
customer_reviews.text: Great little addition to my kitchen, easy to use and clean, free’s up a pan when cooking various dishes
customer_reviews.author: Nick H

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and delivered very quick so I'm impressed. Tried it and heard a loud bang in my kitchen. All power in my apartment was shut off because of this little rice cooker. Very unsafe. Returned it and not refunded yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and hassle free
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and hassle free, no more saucepans bowling over. Takes a couple of attempts to get water/rice combo right, varies with brown rice but once up and running it's great, will always use one now.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 2 months and 10 uses
customer_reviews.text: Have used rice cookers for decades and was careful with this and used correctly. It stopped working after 2 months. Maybe a one off but do you want to risk it? Buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ted T

customer_reviews.title: Trial and Error
customer_reviews.text: As indicated in directions for use, the variables in rice, and ratios of liquid to rice need some degree of experiment to produce desired results ! Still working on it !!
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous creation
customer_reviews.text: This product is marvellous because it works wonders and saves so much time when cooking 💖💖
customer_reviews.author: Zeba Hussain-Ansari

customer_reviews.title: Packaging not up to acceptable standard
customer_reviews.text: On opening the package the rice bowl had two dents. One on the base and one on the top edge. I've managed to reshape them back into position. I hope the rice cooks ok when I use it. Packaging needs to be more robust in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Art Timmins

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival, too cheap to even RMA
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival, too cheap to even RMA, tried changing the kettle leads etc.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Allen

customer_reviews.title: Really Bad
customer_reviews.text: Using this item to cook rice is totally a disaster. Cannot make the rice well-cooked, also hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Ye

customer_reviews.title: It cooked my rice!
customer_reviews.text: Just used for first time tonight and it done a good job. I also like the size of it as not as big as my last one
customer_reviews.author: Jaister1

customer_reviews.title: Student stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's small, enough for two small stomachs. It's convenient for couples and travel people such as students.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Caparas

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Should have taken notice of the reviews 30 days later the front switch wont work pile of junk its heading for the bin tonight
customer_reviews.author: David Allsop

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works more than adequately
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should, far better than I can do it with a normal pan. Good value at the price we paid.
customer_reviews.author: KazakDan

customer_reviews.title: Good Piece Of Kit
customer_reviews.text: Finally a rice cooker that will cook a single portion of rice-great little cooker- My tips-wash/soak rice - do not use too much water - leave on warm 5 minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: jon peter

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 6 times...
customer_reviews.text: After using it for less than 2 months, around 6 times in total, it started burning the rice. It seems like the switch never changes from cook to warm.
customer_reviews.author: Dionisis Kontopodias

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate 0 stars i would, after first use, this has broken so... stay away from it...
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru

customer_reviews.title: Packed up after six months
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well while it was working but just stopped working after six months and I can't figure out why. Power is still getting to it but the mechanism just won't work. Now residing in my wheelie bin and I'm in the market for a new and different model.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sweatman

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: After cooking the cooking switch does not automatically go off.
customer_reviews.author: DMLParanathala

customer_reviews.title: The product and the replacement didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought one but it didn't work so i ask for an exchange. It turned out that even the replacement product was not working at all. So i apply for refund and have sent back both of the products couple days ago. Now i am waiting for the refund. Hopefully they will process it as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: fadilla jamila

customer_reviews.title: This is the best value for money item I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was skeptical about buying the cheapest product out there, but after reading the reviews I decided to purchase this. This unit does everything it says on the box. Easy to use, easy to clean and make awesome tasting rice.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Hubball

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my purchase. Have been used so many times to cook perfect rice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O Neill

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful Does what it says on the box
customer_reviews.text: On the reasonable end. Cheap and cheerful flights ice cooker
customer_reviews.author: nomad

customer_reviews.title: Burns the Rice
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work and burnt the rice to literally charcoal. I was extremely disappointed and got a refund. Maybe it was a faulty one.. but for me zero rating!
customer_reviews.author: MRS S HUSSAIN

customer_reviews.title: Wastes food and a bother to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Rice always sticks to the bottom even if I oil it slightly. No use at all for cooking brown rice. Gave it away and returned to my steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It blew all the fuses in the house on first being plugged in !!!
customer_reviews.text: This item, when first plugged in, blew the socket Circuit breaker in the house. Don't want to try it a second time !! Cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J. Parkhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good rice, good deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price this thing works a charm. No frills rice cooking goodness
customer_reviews.author: LalalaKirby

customer_reviews.title: Not none stick
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the rice stuck to the bottom. I thought it was non stick
customer_reviews.author: dunsfordmonica

customer_reviews.title: Can be better but can't cpmplain with the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as expected except it's not as non-stick as I wish it to be since I used a Panasonic one before which I could just get all the rice out without leaving any single bit. Yet consider the price difference I am satisfy with the product
customer_reviews.author: SharkF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact rice cooker. I bought this for everyday use in my university halls. The non stick makes it much easier to clean. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon

customer_reviews.title: A real time saver and value for money
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. So easy that even a kitchen ignoramus like me can use it. Scoop of water, scoop of rice, and turn it on. Job done. Def value for money.
customer_reviews.author: AT

product_meta.title: LLOYTRON Kitchen Perfected Automatic Non Stick Rice Cooker, 350 W, 08 Litre
product_meta.description: Lloytron E3302 0.8 Automatic Rice Cooker Non-stick removable rice bowl Toughened glass lid with stainless steel rim Keep warm feature Warm & cook indicators Includes measuring cup & spatula Recipes included Capacity: 0.8ltr (approximately 4 cups) Power: 350w Colour: white (WH)
feature_bullets: Toughened glass lid with stainless steel rim
